> <OLD>:
>
>
> "as you two if you have the chance, isnt?" said Hydras halfserious and half
> jocking

JHIAXUS and SCORPONOK looked at each other and then at HYDRAS as if
not sure whether to take him seriously or if he was joking. Both of
them chuckled uncertainly as if hoping he was joking. "Of course . . .
of course sir." They said.

"But that doesn't answer the question though." SCORPONOK said. "How
can we be sure we are in the present."

JHIAXUS nodded, "And if we are, how do we get back." He looked around
at the seekers who were flying out of view, "And do we need to?"

(TAG)

- Preston
